1  Figures for roads are for 2010, pipelines for 2011, rail for the financial year 2011/12.

4  The rail categories provided by ORR and the water categories provided by DfT Port Freight Statistics do not all match the NST categories. Unmatched categories are recorded as "Not categorised".
